reference.title: musicCollection
reference.shortdesc: Indicates a collection of music. Contains a table of CD albums

example.codeblock:
English music These are some of my English albums The Hoodangers
  1. Dang On
  2. Astro-Naughties
  3. Cheep
 I saw this band playing on the streets of Amsterdam in 1997. They were amazing, and I bought their first CD. The newer ones had to be imported from Australia.
